SELECT e.employee_no , e.employee_name , e.department_name , e.rank_name , r.rank_ranking FROM employees e JOIN rank r ON e.rank_name = r.rank_name AND e.company_code = r.company_code WHERE e.company_code = #{companyCode} AND e.department_name = #{departmentName} ORDER BY r.rank_ranking ASC
